Title: .NET nanoFramework app with Azure EventGrid Namespace MQTT support
Summary: This drop show how to configure and deploy a .NET nanoFramework application running on an ESP32 as a client for Azure EventGrid Namespace MQTT support. The device is secured with certificates and supports MQTT features like sending and receiving messages and LWT
Description: Demonstrator for a .NET nanoFramework application running on an ESP32 as a client for Azure EventGrid Namespace MQTT support.
